name: Trapped(Alpha)
description:
Trapped is a 2D platform game. Developed by a solo developer for his first attempt at using Unity Engine.
Your aim is to make it back to the top, conquering all the obstacles, monsters and threats within. This game will test you, make you rage, but do you have the determination to beat the game?
Can you make it back to the top?
Full release coming soon...

This is an alpha build, looking for feedback, ideas and input. As a first time developer I'm looking to mainly improve my skills within unity and code. Please let me know if you enjoy the game, or rage at it :)

Yes, you can make it to the end ;)
